alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bacon, south central Jeff Davis and west central Appling Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Baxley. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Bacon, south central Jeff Davis and west central Appling Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
